scripts.setup: npm install && bower update && npm run compile
scripts.compile: npm run compile-js && npm run compile-less && npm run compile-uikit
scripts.compile-uikit: cd ./assets/uikit && npm run compile && npm run compile-rtl

name: uikit-site-master
description: This is the UIkit 3 website as found on [getuikit.com](https://getuikit.com). Use this repository to have an offline version of the documentation available. If you find errors in the docs, this is the place to report an issue or propose changes via pull-requests.
